properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 8:06PM CST until January 6 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Friday January 3 until Monday January 6.
* At 07 PM Wednesday the stage was 8.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 18.7 feet on Saturday January 04.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Friday January 3 and
continue to rise to near 18.7 feet by Saturday January 4.The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday January 6.
* At 18.0 feet...Water is flowing over Hood Road. The flood plain
between Town Creek and the Tombigbee River is flooded.  Extensive
agricultural flooding is occurring along Highway 6 near Bigbee.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Thursday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
